question: The Union Cabinet approved USOF to provide mobile connectivity in Left Wing Extremism (LWE) areas. What is the full form of USOF ?
explanation: The Union Cabinet has approved the Universal Service Obligation Fund (USOF) supported scheme to provide mobile services at 4,072 tower locations in Left Wing Extremism (LWE) affected areas. The 96 districts in 10 States have to be covered for Phase-ll project and the network has to be used by the security personnel deployed in the naxal affected areas.
